text: The Last of the Mohicans is a 1992 American adventure drama movie directed by Michael Mann and was based on the 1826 novel of the same name by James Fenimore Cooper. It stars Daniel Day-Lewis, Madeleine Stowe, Jodhi May, Wes Studi, Maurice RoÃ«ves, Eric Schweig, Steven Waddington, Pete Postlethwaite, Tracey Ellis and Colm Meaney. It got very positive reviews from movie critics and was successful at the box office. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and won an Academy Award in 1993. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1992 adventure movies Category:1992 drama movies Category:1990s historical movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Michael Mann Category:Movies set in the 18th century Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:Movies set in forests Category:Movies about Native Americans Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about massacres
title: The Last of the Mohicans (1992 movie)
